backend/main.mo: Defines core social network types and in‑memory maps for posts, profiles, friends, requests, reactions, and notifications, including timestamp comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of the 'Find People' navigation item and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files outlining their roles in routing, layout, pages, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps them in AppShell with AuthGate protection.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky header with authenticated desktop and mobile navigation including feed, requests, notifications, settings, and profile links.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, main content container, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Guard component that prompts users to sign in when accessing protected content.
frontend/src/components/FriendActions.ts: Renders friend action buttons based on friendship status and triggers friend request mutations with error handling.
frontend/src/components/FriendRequestCar: Displays an incoming or outgoing friend request with profile info and actions to accept, decline, or cancel.
frontend/src/components/FriendsList.tsx: Fetches and displays a user's friends with profile avatars and navigation to each profile.
frontend/src/components/ImagePicker.tsx: Allows selecting, previewing, validating, and removing an image file, supporting upload progress and size/type checks.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides sign‑in/sign‑out UI using Internet Identity and handles login state and errors.
frontend/src/components/PostComments.tsx: Loads, displays, adds, and deletes comments on a post with authentication checks and collapsible UI.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: Form for creating a post with text and optional image using an ImagePicker and createPost mutation.
frontend/src/components/PostEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing an existing post’s text and media, using ImagePicker and updatePost mutation with validation.
frontend/src/components/PostList.tsx: Renders a list of posts with author info, media, reactions, comments, and optional pin handling for profile mode.
frontend/src/components/PostOwnerActions: Provides edit, delete, and optional pin/unpin actions for posts owned by the authenticated user.
frontend/src/components/PostReactions.ts: Displays reaction count and allows authenticated users to toggle a heart reaction on a post.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditor.ts: Form for editing and saving the caller's profile, including display name, bio, avatar, and cover photo.
frontend/src/components/ProfileImages.ts: Displays a user's cover photo and avatar with fallbacks and size presets.
frontend/src/components/UserCard.tsx: Shows a compact user profile card with avatar, bio, navigation, and follow/unfollow controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication state and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and deleting post comments with query cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollow.ts: Hooks for checking follow status and performing follow/unfollow actions while updating related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowStats.ts: Fetches follower/following stats for a user with safe defaults on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching friends, friendship status, and managing friend request actions via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an auth provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, persistence, status, and logout using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Supplies hooks for fetching caller notifications and marking individual or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Contains hooks to fetch, create, update, delete, and pin posts while invalidating related query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save user profiles for the caller or a specified principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useReactions.ts: Exposes hooks for fetching reactions on posts and toggling the caller’s reaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Adds hooks for retrieving and saving caller-specific user settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeline.ts: Defines a hook to fetch the caller’s aggregated timeline posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Provides a hook for searching user directory profiles by text.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated user’s feed with a post composer, loading states, and redirects if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/FriendRequestsPage.ts: Displays incoming and outgoing friend requests with loading states and uses FriendRequestCard for each request.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows a marketing-style landing page with login and feature highlights, redirecting authenticated users to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's profile, stats, posts, and profile editor logic with fallbacks for loading/setup states.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with support for marking individual or all notifications as read and displays profile info for senders.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI to update display name and privacy settings with save actions and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UserDirectoryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable user directory with tabs, loading states, and rendering UserCard results.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Page component that loads and displays another user's profile, posts, friendship status, and follow stats, handling invalid IDs and redirects for own profile.
frontend/src/utils/formatDate.ts: Converts bigint nanosecond timestamps into human‑readable dates using date-fns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, UI notes, and versioning for the application.
